titleStmt.title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie geueth all maner her subiects to vnderstand, that where of late it hath ben agreed at Brugis in Flaunders, in a treatie ... by commissioners on the part of her Maiestie, and of the king of Spaine, her good brother ...
Proclamations. 1565-10-16
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyard, by Richard Iugge, and Iohn Cawood Printers to the Queenes Maiesty [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation maintaining intercourse with Spain.
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
At foot of sheet: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
